    • writeResponse

      void writeResponse(MicroservletResponse response)
      Writes the given response object to the servlet output stream in JSON format. If the request is invalid, or the response is null or invalid, a MicroservletErrorResponse is sent with the captured error messages.
      Parameters:
      response - The response to write to the HTTP output stream
